file.name: inventory-swagger-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Inventory REST API
  description: Inventory REST API
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: //127.0.0.1:30203/
tags:
- name: app-lcm-inventory-handler
  description: App Lcm Inventory Handler
- name: app-repo-inventory-handler
  description: App Repo Inventory Handler
- name: app-rule-manager-inventory-handler
  description: App Rule Manager Inventory Handler
- name: app-store-inventory-handler
  description: App Store Inventory Handler
- name: appd-rule-inventory-handler
  description: Appd Rule Inventory Handler
- name: inventory-handler
  description: Inventory Handler
- name: mec-host-inventory-handler
  description: Mec Host Inventory Handler
paths:
  /inventory/v1/applcms:
    get:
      tags:
      - app-lcm-inventory-handler
      summary: Retrieves all application LCM records
      operationId: getAllAppLcmRecordsUsingGET
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
      deprecated: false
    post:
      tags:
      - app-lcm-inventory-handler
      summary: Adds new application LCM record
      operationId: addAppLcmRecordUsingPOST
      requestBody:
        description: applcm inventory information
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppLcmDto'
        required: false
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        201:
          description: Created
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
      deprecated: false
      x-codegen-request-body-name: appLcmDto
    delete:
      tags:
      - app-lcm-inventory-handler
      summary: Deletes all application LCM records
      operationId: deleteAllAppLcmRecordsUsingDELETE
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        204:
          description: No Content
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
      deprecated: false

      tags:
      - app-lcm-inventory-handler
      summary: Retrieves application LCM record
      operationId: getAppLcmRecordUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: applcm_ip
        in: path
        description: applcm IP
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppLcmDto'
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
      deprecated: false
    put:
      tags:
      - app-lcm-inventory-handler
      summary: Updates existing application LCM record
      operationId: updateAppLcmRecordUsingPUT
      parameters:
      - name: applcm_ip
        in: path
        description: applcm IP
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        description: applcm inventory information
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppLcmDto'
        required: false
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        201:
          description: Created
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
      deprecated: false
      x-codegen-request-body-name: appLcmDto
    delete:

      summary: Deletes application LCM record
      operationId: deleteAppLcmRecordUsingDELETE
      parameters:
      - name: applcm_ip

        description: applcm IP
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:

        204:
          description: No Content
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
      deprecated: false

        401:

          content: {}

        401:

      responses:
        200:

          content:
            application/json:

        201:

          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}

    delete:

      responses:
        200:
          description: OK

        204:
          description: No Content

        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
      deprecated: false

      responses:

          description: OK

        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found

      operationId: addMecHostRecordUsingPOST

          content: {}

        404:

        200:

        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:

          content: {}
        404:

          content: {}

    put:
      tags:
      - mec-host-inventory-handler
      summary: Updates existing MEC host record
      operationId: updateMecHostRecordUsingPUT
      parameters:
      - name: mechost_ip
        in: path

        required: true

      requestBody:
        description: mechost inventory information
        content:

        required: false

        200:

        201:
          description: Created

  /inventory/v1/mechosts/{mechost_ip}/k8sconfig:
    post:
      tags:
      - mec-host-inventory-handler
      summary: Upload K8s configuration file to applcm
      operationId: uploadConfigFileUsingPOST
      parameters:
      - name: access_token
        in: header
        description: access token
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: mechost_ip
        in: path
        description: mechost IP
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              properties:
                file:
                  type: string
                  description: config file
                  format: binary
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                type: string
        201:
          description: Created
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
      deprecated: false
    delete:
      tags:
      - mec-host-inventory-handler
      summary: Deletes K8s configuration file from applcm
      operationId: deleteConfigFileUsingDELETE
      parameters:
      - name: access_token
        in: header
        description: access token
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: mechost_ip
        in: path
        description: mechost IP
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
        204:
          description: No Content
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
      deprecated: false

    get:
      tags:
      - appd-rule-inventory-handler
      summary: Retrieves appDRule records for given tenent ID and app instance ID
      operationId: getAppdRuleRecordUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: app_instance_id
        in: path
        description: app instance identifier
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: tenant_id
        in: path
        description: tenant identifier
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized

      operationId: updateAppdRuleRecordUsingPUT
      parameters:
      - name: app_instance_id
        in: path
        description: app instance identifier
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: tenant_id

        description: tenant identifier
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        description: appD rule inventory information
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:

        required: false
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        201:
          description: Created
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
      deprecated: false
      x-codegen-request-body-name: appDRuleConfigDto
    post:
      tags:
      - appd-rule-inventory-handler
      summary: Adds AppD rule record
      operationId: addAppdRuleRecordUsingPOST
      parameters:
      - name: app_instance_id
        in: path
        description: app instance identifier
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: tenant_id
        in: path

components:
  schemas:
    AppLcmDto:
      title: AppLcmDto
      type: object
      properties:
        applcmIp:
          type: string
        applcmName:
          type: string
        applcmPort:
          type: string
        userName:
          type: string
    AppRepoDto:
      title: AppRepoDto
      type: object
      properties:
        repoEndPoint:
          type: string
        repoName:
          type: string
        repoPassword:
          type: string
        repoUserName:
          type: string
    AppRuleDto:
      title: AppRuleDto
      type: object
      properties:
        appRuleIp:
          type: string
        appRuleName:
          type: string
        appRulePort:
          type: string
        userName:
          type: string
    AppStoreDto:
      title: AppStoreDto
      type: object
      properties:
        appstoreIp:
          type: string
        appstoreName:
          type: string
        appstorePort:
          type: string
        appstoreRepo:
          type: string
        appstoreRepoName:
          type: string
        appstoreRepoPassword:
          type: string
        appstoreRepoUserName:
          type: string
        producer:
          type: string
    AppdRuleConfigDto:
      title: AppdRuleConfigDto
      type: object
      properties:
        appDNSRule:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DnsRuleDto'
        appName:
          type: string
        appSupportMp1:
          type: boolean
        appTrafficRule:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrafficRuleDto'
    DnsRuleDto:
      title: DnsRuleDto
      type: object
      properties:
        dnsRuleId:
          type: string
        domainName:
          type: string
        ipAddress:
          type: string
        ipAddressType:
          type: string
          enum:
          - IP_V4
          - IP_V6
        ttl:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    DstInterfaceDto:
      title: DstInterfaceDto
      type: object
      properties:
        dstIpAddress:
          type: string
        dstMacAddress:
          type: string
        interfaceType:
          type: string
        srcMacAddress:
          type: string
        tunnelInfo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TunnelInfoDto'
    MecApplicationDto:
      title: MecApplicationDto
      type: object
      properties:
        appInstanceId:
          type: string
        appName:
          type: string
        capabilities:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        packageId:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
    MecHostDto:
      title: MecHostDto
      type: object
      properties:
        address:
          type: string
        affinity:
          type: string
        appRuleIp:
          type: string
        applcmIp:
          type: string
        city:
          type: string
        coordinates:
          type: string
        hwcapabilities:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/MecHwCapabilityDto'
        mechostIp:
          type: string
        mechostName:
          type: string
        userName:
          type: string
        zipCode:
          type: string
    MecHwCapabilityDto:
      title: MecHwCapabilityDto
      type: object
      properties:
        hwModel:
          type: string
        hwType:
          type: string
        hwVendor:
          type: string
    Status:
      title: Status
      type: object
      properties:
        response:
          type: string
    TrafficFilterDto:
      title: TrafficFilterDto
      type: object
      properties:
        dscp:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        dstAddress:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        dstPort:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        dstTunnelAddress:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        dstTunnelPort:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        protocol:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        qci:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        srcAddress:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        srcPort:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        srcTunnelAddress:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        srcTunnelPort:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        tag:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        tc:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    TrafficRuleDto:
      title: TrafficRuleDto
      type: object
      properties:
        action:
          type: string
          enum:
          - DROP
          - FORWARD_DECAPSULATED
          - FORWARD_AS_IS
          - PASSTHROUGH
          - DUPLICATED_DECAPSULATED
          - DUPLICATE_AS_IS
        dstInterface:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DstInterfaceDto'
        filterType:
          type: string
          enum:
          - FLOW
          - PACKET
        priority:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        trafficFilter:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrafficFilterDto'
        trafficRuleId:
          type: string
    TunnelInfoDto:
      title: TunnelInfoDto
      type: object
      properties:
        tunnelDstAddress:
          type: string
        tunnelSpecificData:
          type: string
        tunnelSrcAddress:
          type: string
        tunnelType:
          type: string

Error: notImplemented: path "/inventory/v1/health": get: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/plain]
